law.catch_line: To qualify for a reverse equity loan under § 4-804(5) of this subtitle, an applicant shall:...
law.text:
To qualify for a reverse equity loan under § 4-804(5) of this subtitle, an applicant shall:
be at least 62 years old when the loan closes; and
need financial assistance with housing-related expenses or personal expenses that enable the owner to continue to occupy the home.
